metadata.title: Partner with Tenerife Activity | Accommodation Partnerships
metadata.description: Join our accommodation partner program. Earn 10% commission on every activity booked. No investment, no subscription. Fully managed by our excursion partner.

hero.title: Partner with Tenerife Activity
hero.subtitle: Enhance your guest experience and generate additional revenue through our curated excursion program.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.paragraph1: Our partnership model is designed to be simple and straightforward. We handle all aspects of the excursion business, while you focus on providing exceptional accommodation services to your guests.
howItWorks.paragraph2: When guests book activities through your accommodation, you earn a commission on every booking. There are no upfront costs, no subscription fees, and no ongoing management responsibilities on your part.

benefits.title: Why It Benefits Accommodations
benefits.paragraph1: Offering curated excursions enhances your accommodation's value proposition and provides guests with a seamless way to discover and book experiences during their stay.
benefits.paragraph2: By partnering with us, you differentiate your property from competitors, increase guest satisfaction, and create an additional revenue stream without increasing your operational overhead.
benefits.paragraph3: Your guests benefit from access to carefully selected, high-quality activities, while you benefit from a professional partnership that requires no time or resources to manage.

earnings.title: What Partners Earn
earnings.paragraph1: Partners earn a {commission} commission on every activity booked through the partnership program.
earnings.paragraph2: Commissions are calculated on the total booking value and paid monthly via bank transfer. You receive detailed monthly statements that clearly show all bookings, commissions earned, and payment details.
earnings.paragraph3: There are no minimum booking requirements, no hidden fees, and no charges for using our platform. You only receive moneyâ€”you never pay anything to participate.

management.title: What You Don't Have to Manage
management.paragraph1: We handle all operational aspects of the excursion program, so you don't have to.

items.selection: Activity selection, curation, and quality control

management.paragraph2: Your role is simply to make the program available to your guests. Everything else is handled by our experienced excursion partner.

legal.title: Legal & Professional Framework
legal.paragraph1: All partnerships are governed by clear, professional agreements that define roles, responsibilities, and commission structures.
legal.paragraph2: Our excursion partner is fully licensed and insured, ensuring compliance with all relevant tourism regulations and consumer protection requirements.
legal.paragraph3: Partners receive comprehensive documentation, including partnership terms, commission schedules, payment procedures, and support contact information. All financial transactions are transparent and documented.
legal.paragraph4: The partnership is non-exclusive, meaning you can continue working with other excursion providers if you choose. There are no long-term commitments or penalties for ending the partnership.

cta.question: Ready to enhance your accommodation offering and generate additional revenue?
cta.disclaimer: Partnership application form coming soon. Please contact us directly for more information.

section.title: Turn your accommodation into a revenue stream

results.title: Your perfect Tenerife experiences
results.subtitle: Based on your preferences, here are our recommendations
results.subtitleFallback: Here are some popular experiences you will love.
results.noResults: No activities found matching your criteria. Try adjusting your preferences.

1.title: Teide by Night
1.description: Experience the magical sunset and stargazing from Mount Teide, Spain's highest peak. Witness breathtaking views and the clearest skies in Europe.

2.title: Siam Park
2.description: Europe's best water park with thrilling slides, lazy rivers, and tropical landscapes. Perfect for families and thrill-seekers.

3.title: Loro Parque
3.description: World-famous animal park and conservation center. Discover exotic animals, stunning shows, and learn about wildlife conservation.

4.title: Luxury Catamaran Cruise
4.description: Sail along Tenerife's stunning coastline on a luxury catamaran. Spot whales and dolphins, enjoy premium amenities, and relax in style.

seo.defaultDescription: Premium tourism experiences in Tenerife. Discover curated activities, tours, and adventures for your perfect Canary Islands getaway.

twinTicket.title: Twin Ticket
twinTicket.description: One ticket, two iconic parks: Siam Park + Loro Parque. The easiest way to see Tenerife's top attractions.

twoParksTicket.title: Two Parks Ticket
twoParksTicket.description: Combine two parks in one smart deal (e.g., Jungle Park + Aqualand). Perfect for families and groups.

specialPacks.title: Special Packs
specialPacks.description: Curated water-activity bundles (Parasailing, Jet Ski, Fly Fish and more). Big thrills, better price.

boosterPacks.title: Booster Packs
boosterPacks.description: Mix and match the island's best ocean experiences (Jet Ski + Parasailing style combos) at a special rate.
